definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: form, fashion (NH in pt. [[יוֹחֵר]] potter, creator, and deriv.; Ph. [[יחר]] potter; Targum [[יחר]] Syr. yas.ro0 = [[יֵחֶר]] etc.; Ar. was.run covenant, contract; As. êṣêru, as Heb., Dl:HWB 309)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of a potter who forms out of clay a vessel Is 29:16, Is 41:25, Je 18:4, Je 18:4, Je 18:6, Je 18:6, 1Ch 4:23, La 4:2, Zec 11:13, Zec 11:13 (these last two acc. to Thes SS et al. error for [[אוֹחָר]]); ´[[י]]([[ה]])[[כְּלִי ]] potter's vessel 2 S 2Sa 17:28, Ps 2:9, Je 19:11; ´[[חׂמֶר הי]] potter's clay Is 29:16; ´[[נֵבֶל י]] Is 30:14; ´[[בַּקְבֻּק י]] Je 19:1 ´[[בית הי]] Je 18:2, Je 18:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of a carver of wood, graven images Is 44:9, Is 44:10, Is 44:12, Hb Hab 2:18, Hab 2:18.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: frame, devise in the mind [[עָמָל]] ´[[י]] Ps 94:20.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (as a potter) forming Adam out of [[עפר]] from [[אדמה]] Ge 2:7, Ge 2:8 (J), beasts and birds, also from [[אדמה]] v:Ge 2:19 (J); Israel as a people Is 27:11, Is 43:1, Is 43:21, Is 44:21, Is 45:9, Is 45:9, Is 45:11, Is 64:7, even from the womb Is 44:2, Is 44:24; the servant of Yahweh from the womb Is 49:5; of the formation of the individual man Is 43:7; Jeremiah in the womb Je 1:5; the eye of man Ps 94:9; the locust Am 7:1; Leviathan Ps 104:26; the dry land Ps 95:5; the earth Is 45:18, Is 45:18; the mountains Am 4:13; [[הַכּׂל]] Je 10:16 = Je 51:19. Fig. perh. lost sight of in some of the above, and quite certainly in the forming of light Is 45:7, of summer and winter Ps 74:17, the [[רוּחַ]] of man Zec 12:1, and the [[לב]] of men Ps 33:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig. for frame, pre-ordain, plan (in divine purpose), of a situation [[מֵרָחוֹק]] Is 22:11; of an occurrence [[מִימֵי קֶדֶם]] Is 37:26 = 2Ki 19:25; [[יׇחַרְתִּי]] [[אַף אֶעֱשֶׂנׇּה]] I have planned, I will also do it Is 46:11; [[רעה על]] ´[[י]] Je 18:11; [[לַהֲכִינׇהּ]] ´[[י]] devised it to establish it Je 33:2.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[לְפָנַי לאׁ־נוֹחַר אֵל]] Is 43:10 before me a god was not formed (created).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[יׇמִים יֻצָָּרוּ]] days (that) were pre-ordained (in the divine purpose) Ps 139:16 (cf.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[כָּל־כְּלִי יוּחַר עָלַיִח לאׁ יִחְלָָח]] Is 54:17 any weapon that is formed against thee will not prosper.
